byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and AMY CHOZICK

abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton calls on technology firms to help government develop 'unified national strategy in cyberspace' to stop Islamic State from recruiting members, in United States and globally, via Internet.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton again urged Silicon Valley to work with the government to develop a “unified national strategy” to stop the Islamic State from recruiting via the Internet.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Asks Tech Companies to Help Thwart ISIS Online
headline.print_headline: Clinton Asks Tech Firms to Help Stop ISIS Online

snippet: Mrs. Clinton again urged Silicon Valley to work with the government to develop a “unified national strategy” to stop the Islamic State from recruiting via the Internet.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
